Uses of Class
com.tsp.models.Domino

  • Packages that use Domino 
    Package Description
    com.tsp.models  

    • Uses of Domino in com.tsp.models

      Methods in com.tsp.models that return Domino 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Domino<?> Hand.chooseDomino(int left, int right)
      This function chooses the domino to play from the player's hand if he has any corresponding and removes it from the hand.
      Domino<?> Hand.chooseDominoWithoutRemoving(int left, int right)
      This function chooses the domino to play from the player's hand if he has any corresponding without removing it from the hand.
      Domino Hand.drawFromStock()
      This function checks if the stock still contains dominos.
      Domino Hand.getDomino(int v1, int v2)
      This function checks if the domino with the value v1 and v2 exists get it and remove it from the user's hand.
      Domino Stock.getRandomDomino()
      This function browse the stock and pick a random domino from it.
      Domino Stock.next()
      This function returns the next domino in the vector browsing the stock.
      Methods in com.tsp.models with parameters of type Domino 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Hand.canPutItOnTable(Domino<java.lang.Integer> d, int extLeftValue, int extRightValue)
      This function checks if the player can play/put a chosen domino on the table according to the current extreme table values.
      void Hand.removeFromHand(Domino d)
      This function removes a specific domino from the player's hand.
      void Table.setNewExtremes(Domino<java.lang.Integer> d)
      When a player choose a domino to play, this function changes the extreme values already on the table with the new ones from the domino played.
